I am an Assistant Professor of Economics and Data Science at Quinnipiac University. As an applied microeconomist, my primary research interests are in labor and education with specific focus on issues around income, wealth, and educational inequalities.

## Education

**PhD in Economics**, CUNY Graduate Center, 2025

**MS in Econometrics and Quantitative Economics**, SUNY at Buffalo, 2018 

**B.Tech in Civil Engineering**, Gujarat Technological University, 2014
